creditline: Gift of Leo A. and Doris Hodroff
description: rose Imari armorial; central coat of arms; helmet crest and supports within scrolling lotus and peach
text: The coat of arms on this plate are of the Clifford family of Chudleigh, England, and the service was one of three ordered for Hugh, 4th Baron Clifford by his mother while he was still a minor. Although he inherited the title and estates when he was six, he did not turn twenty-one until 1747.
title: Rose Imari plate with coat of arms in the center
